H0.text: Which South Wales town was formed when Margam and Aberavon combined in the 1920s. Port Talbot

H1.text: Which South Wales town was formed when Margam and Aberavon combined in the 1920s. Neath

H2.text: Which South Wales town was formed when Margam and Aberavon combined in the 1920s. Swansea

H3.text: Which South Wales town was formed when Margam and Aberavon combined in the 1920s. Portalbot

A4.text: The borough of Port Talbot was created in November 1921, incorporating Margam, Cwmafan and Aberafan.

A5.text: Modern Port Talbot is a town formed from the merging of multiple villages, including Baglan, Margam, and Aberafan.
